title: Regarding 'Elementalist Lux'...
body:
So her 'main' splash art has been 'released', but what about other versions of her splash arts? I know Sona and Udyr only got 'recolorings/retexturings' of their main art on the ultimate skin but, seeing that Elementalist Lux has different 'icon arts' for what element she is in, does that mean she will have 10 (I think) splash arts?

Or if they've already been released, gee I'm slow

replies.body:
They haven't no. I have my doubts about getting 10 splash arts. Maybe another 4 for the main, or maybe a second for darkness, but highly unlikely all 10 of them. The themes are so vastly different between them it'd pretty much be a brand new splash art for each just with similar compositions as far as pose and background go.

But like you, I'd love to have 10 new splash arts, I love the splashes Riot does. I'm just not holding out much hope :P
Well if Riot wants to up their game :P
